Reviews.Title: replacement tv in bedroom
Reviews.Author: gwo
Reviews.Content: This unit was a replacement for an old CRT TV we had. The picture is fantastic. It has very good and loud sound for the size TV. Very light and easy to set up. The price was just right for the size TV and no shipping charges. Perfect size for a medium size bedroom.

Reviews.Title: The 26" is fine --- so why did they remove the headphone jack on the 29"?
Reviews.Author: Tom Suarez "Cattigara"
Reviews.Content: First bought the 26", and it is quite good for all the reasons stated by others. The stand is flimsy, but that's understandable in this price range.But then ordered the 29", which in theory is the same TV except for the screen size---and indeed it appears to be BUT open the package and find that it has no headphone jack. WEIRD. (Returned it on that account.)It is so common for people to plug computer speakers into these TVs, especially given how notoriously poor their internal speakers are... why would LG include the jack on the 26" but not on the 29"?

Reviews.Title: Can ya hear me now?
Reviews.Author: sheperdess
Reviews.Content: Picture is very good for the price, the set up was easy however the sound leaves much to be desired.I would only recommend this model to those with a very small room.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Michele L. Duwell
Reviews.Content: We purchased this tv for our screen room and just love it.  Setup was a breeze and the size is great for our screen room.

Reviews.Title: Good Bargain for the Price
Reviews.Author: DVHarris
Reviews.Content: It's perfect for the bedroom, if you don't have to attach many components. The tiny speakers are, in a word, awful, but there are two ways to attach a sound system. I purchased a very inexpensive pair of computer speakers ($20.00), and connected them via the headphone input. The difference is sound quality was dramatic. You will have to go into the menu and change the sound setting to "Headphones."  There are inputs in the back if you want something more sophisticated. What can I say? Good bang for the buck!

Reviews.Title: Great in our kitchen
Reviews.Author: John Manley
Reviews.Content: We bought this unit to use in our kitchen so we were not concerned about it having lots of inputs. The picture is superb and the sound is very adequate. Our kitchen is quite bright and we noticed that reflections from windows, etc. are minimal.

Reviews.Title: very good price
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Marks "yorkie lover"
Reviews.Content: The picture is pretty good....The sound could be louder.  Slim size makes it perfect or the kitchen counter..  Great price compared to Walmart

Reviews.Title: Seriously Flawed!!
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Rust
Reviews.Content: I have trusted LG over the years with several television purchases, never again!Here are the problems with this set:1-the sound quality is the worst of any television we've had.  It was especially poor with sports. All that could be heard was crowd noise.2-due to the poor sound quality we bought a Bose system to stand in for the television speakers.  To our surprise this television has NO AUDIO OUT capability.  It simply can't be hooked up to any set of speakers.3-the picture quality is inferior in every respect.  The colors are flat and faded on any setting.  The angle viewing is completely unacceptable.SUMMARY:: An poor television in every respect.  Don't waste your money

Reviews.Title: Good solid t.v. for the price.
Reviews.Author: Rhubarb & Knave
Reviews.Content: The picture is very good.  This is a great t.v. for a kids room.  Drawbacks: lack of inputs (one HDMI and one component) so not a t.v. for a A/V Heavies like myself.  A lack of picture and sound options also limi it's performance.  And finally, the base is very cheaply made, almost laughable.  But, if this is for secondary operations (kitchen, kids room or garage), it a good t.v.  I love LG products, but they are like everyone else; the more  you spend the better you get.

Reviews.Title: LB TV is nice.
Reviews.Author: MGR
Reviews.Content: Nice TV and every thing I expected.  Not as outstanding as Sony but good.  I didn't even know LG made TV's  but wouldn't hesitate to purchase a LG TV again.

Reviews.Title: my first
Reviews.Author: scott
Reviews.Content: This is my first led tv at first I was really sceptical about these and other types of flat screen tv`s. Did some research on them and pick one out refurbished and I love it. Thank You. Just wished it had  extra audio/video port (red,yellow white plugs) and a diffrent audio out puts for maybe a surround sound system other than that I love it, Thank You

Reviews.Title: Perfect tv
Reviews.Author: Katherine Landry
Reviews.Content: On time and easy to begin using. Perfect for the bedroom. Very happy with this product.  Would buy another one

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV and a good value
Reviews.Author: Ron Tidmore
Reviews.Content: Color is outstanding.  Setup was easy.  Sound, for a 26" TV is very acceptable.  Good value from Amazon.  Very pleased with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Kitchen TV. Small Footprint
Reviews.Author: P. Sarquis "Info Junkie"
Reviews.Content: Thi is a very basic 24" TV best suited for single-purpose use, such as watching TV in a kitchen or garage.  The remote feels cheap, but has all of the necessary functions and the on-screen setup is easy enough.  I like the channel add/delete/block feature, so you can easily remove certain channels from your path.  This TV was under $200 on Amazon when I bought it and I thought the unit met my expectations when I received it.  It's a 720p unit, but can easily produce 1080i picture, which will suffice for HD cable setups.

Reviews.Title: Very mediocre TV even for the price
Reviews.Author: Karl R. Schneider
Reviews.Content: I bought this model to put in a small room I was remodeling and so did not even open up the box for 4 months...and was amazed to discover it has NO audio output connection whatsoever...and the tiny speakers are virtually unlistenable.  I had no idea any major TV manufacturer these days would have omitted such a basic feature (which costs about 30 cents to add the jack), especially LG.  What a disappointment.  The picture is just okay, nothing to write home about and the menu system is I suppose adequate but somewhat kludgy.  There are way better bargains out there.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: LongRodVonHugenDoong
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace my wife's computer monitor in her office so she could just switch between the hdtv over the air signal and her computer output since i got tired of hearing doctor phil and judge joe brown all day long.  Decent picture quality. Color hue and saturation takes some playing with but not hard to figure out and took less than two minutes.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: John Miller
Reviews.Content: Great picture not much support for set up Love the TV not the support called the support line said plug it in and it will work

Reviews.Title: Great tv at an affordable price.
Reviews.Author: K-dog
Reviews.Content: Awesome tv for the bedroom.  Does exactly what it was bought for. Don't let the low price fool you, good quality.

Reviews.Title: Bargain TV, good value, sound not great
Reviews.Author: racecarguy
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with the TV, and felt like I received a good value.  Like many other reviews, the sound quality leaves a lot to be desired.  My TV does have a headphone jack, so I will likely purchase external speakers to improve the sound.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture and Sound, Great Value
Reviews.Author: DJWRITER
Reviews.Content: Purchased this around X-Mas so have been using it for almost 4 months. I am still very impressed with the picture and sound quality. I had purchased another name brand first and was very disappointed; returned it and got this one instead...now very happy!

Reviews.Title: Just right
Reviews.Author: Janet Mueller-Alsup
Reviews.Content: We bought this for a small space in our kitchen. It is just right. Picture clarity is excellent and sound is very clear as well. It is all it was advertised to be and we are thrilled with it.

Reviews.Title: Picture not the best
Reviews.Author: Michael M. Rosecrans
Reviews.Content: This was used in a sewing room and is not used daily.  The picture seems to darken considerable during some shows on this TV but not on other TVs we have.

Reviews.Title: veiwing angle terrible
Reviews.Author: nelson "L Nelson"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tv for dining room, thought a well rated one like LG would be a good choice. How wrong I was. Tried both 24 and 28 inch they come in great if you are right in front of them, but at any angle you lose picture quality fast, both horizontal and vertical. Bought a 28" Seiki from sears for 1/3 less and even at 45 degrees comes in good. I have a 12' by 12' room and with the LG people on opposite sides of table had completely different picture, not with the Seiki.

Reviews.Title: Fit in the spot.
Reviews.Author: Grant W.
Reviews.Content: The only weakness that sticks out, (as others have said) is the sound. It's not so bad, but I usually have the volume set at about 50 to 80 of 100. Other than that I like the way I can run through the channels very fast. I use outdoor antennas and it seems to pickup all the same channels that my last TV did. As with many new things it has way more settings and things than I ever need to watch just TV.  {just for info- I have a Sansui 24in in my bedroom that seems to have a clunker, however much more sensitive tuner. It can pickup one of the local channels that has  unrepaired transmitter problems that nothing else, TVs or Converter boxes can.}

Reviews.Title: LG all the way.
Reviews.Author: Stephen N Demeter
Reviews.Content: I tried 2 other brand TV's in this kitchen location. One could not hold the signal and pixelated on certain channels. The other would scramble when I used the micro wave. The LG has performed flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I would suggest passing on this item.  The picture quality was terrible, my old RCA had a clearer picture quality.  Sound was not great either.  The monitor had to be held up with a glasses case NOT cool lol.  We decided to return it and got a larger and better quality TV for less money.  Very disappointed in you LG.

Reviews.Title: Downward facing speakers no good for an enclosed entertainment unit
Reviews.Author: Robert S
Reviews.Content: I needed a 29" TV that would fit into an entertainment unit so I bought an LG 29LN4510. However I couldn't get past the awful sound from the downward facing speakers when placed in a recess. I just wanted voices to be clear but they were not despite tweaking the numerous audio settings available. I bought the Vizio E291i-A1 because it had front facing speakers and these proved far superior for this kind of installation - not a home theater quality but plenty of volume and crisp clear voice unlike the LG. After tweaking settings on both I was also able to get a noticeably better picture on the Vizio in terms of color, contrast, and detail. I'm very pleased with the picture. The LG does have a wider viewing angle but fine detail seems slightly soft - and it's just not as life-like. I didn't originally care about smart TV features but I've found they're a big plus for the Vizio - the Netflix app is a pleasure to use.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV. Awesome picture and sound. Buy it now!
Reviews.Author: seth
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent television for the money! I would highly recommend it over all others I researched on Amazon around this size. It gives you a couple extra inches over the 27" sets and it still fits well in my entertainment center. Of course it has a gorgeous picture and sweet stereo sound. There aren't an over abundance of inputs on the back, yet it has the basics for what it needs to get the job done, and at the best price. BUY IT! You will be glad you did! I certainly am.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size for bedroom.
Reviews.Author: CRS "WC"
Reviews.Content: Perfect size, picture, sound, and delivery. Almost made me happy about the old ones demise. Love the television and its options.

Reviews.Title: Great product !
Reviews.Author: RJMACD
Reviews.Content: Top shelf ! Great picture...easy set up.......arrived on time ! !  I would recommend to others !  Great value for the money ! Cheaper than Walmart .

Reviews.Title: This is also a DC set
Reviews.Author: California collector
Reviews.Content: I purchased this model because I was looking for a flat screen TV that could be operated on 12 volts in my RV when running on solar power and deep cycle batteries.  They don't sell this as a DC set, but I discovered that it uses an outboard AC to DC power supply, just like a laptop computer, and the voltage is 19 volts just as with a laptop.  The wattage is also comparable to that required by a laptop.  I have a DC to DC adapter for my Lenovo laptop and found that it would power the TV off of 12 volts very nicely.  I did have to construct a male to female adapter so that the laptop supply would plug into the TV, but all it took was a couple of small parts from Radio Shack.  So, if you are looking for a 26 inch TV for an RV, Sleeper cab on an 18 wheeler, or for tailgate parties, this TV works very well with the right adapter, and it's a heck of a lot cheaper than the ones that are sold as 12 volt sets!

Reviews.Title: My Daughter Loved It -- Especially the Energy Saving Capabilities
Reviews.Author: Glenn A. Michaels
Reviews.Content: I purchased this because of the favorable reviews which were right on. I ordered one for my daughter and her new apartment and she and her roommate could not be happier. That makes me very happy. She had an old TV and is on a budget so this will help a lot. Plus, she can hook her computer to it and loves that aspect. I would recommend this as a gift to anyone based on the feedback I have received. Thank you Amazon and the other reviewers for helping with a great choice.

Reviews.Title: Buy Something Else....
Reviews.Author: K. Miller "Stylusx"
Reviews.Content: On short notice I had to replace a very nice Samsung 26" LCD HDTV.  My space required nothing wider than 28"...so I was limited in choices...and shut out of the most common 1080p 32" units available.I purchased the 29" LG LED TV.Pros:  It is cheap at around $300.  It fit the space I had...the TV was 26.3" wide.  The "pros" end there.Cons:  The screen resolution is worse than you would expect from a 720p resolution on satellite (DirecTV).The picture adjustments, although aided by a nice on-screen app, are clumsy. The results from the app make you want to try it yourself for color and contrast balance.The instructions and documentation are very poor.  I called Amazon tech support, which provides 30 days of free advice on this unit.  Even they had no documentation for the unit.The component inputs and outputs are very bare bones.  In fact, the unit provides NO AUDIO ANALOG output.  Therefore, you can forget about piping this into your media center receiver.  The downside of this is that the speakers on the TV are subpar...so you better be using this in a small room.Compared to the 8 year old Samsung I was replacing, the interfaces available on this LG were primordial.  Did I mention it was CHEAP?The stand is not adjustable, so that if you need to center the unit in a media cabinet, you just need to stack up some books.  The overall styling is very generic...Over all, if you have time to consider other units, do so.  There is no reason to waste time on a unit like the LG when better 1080p units should be available soon in this size (29") class.Amazon gladly offered to take the unit back, but had no replacements in the size range.  Maybe its time to turn off the tube and do some reading.

Reviews.Title: 22ln4500 is only 720p
Reviews.Author: B. PS5
Reviews.Content: decent picture decent sound except it is ONLY 720p.I am returning it and getting something with full hd 1080p.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the $$!
Reviews.Author: David T. Laughrun
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the $$! It's a great TV!  Easy to use!  On screen navigation is intuitive.  I would definitely purchase it again...

Reviews.Title: LG 29"  television review
Reviews.Author: Tim S.
Reviews.Content: Just got this LG television hooked-up this morning. Has a great picture! Perfect choice for the bedroom it's in. I recommend this TV to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: John F. Cargen "jackycbreeze"
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. Great graphics and my son is huge gamer. I would recommend this TV to anyone who needs a small TV. I got a great buy at Amazon. 2 thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Buy LG if you want real sound and a good picture .
Reviews.Author: Rodmiami
Reviews.Content: I love LG Tvs so when we had to replace our old 13" crt type tv in our kitchen i started looking for a small LG to replace it .We only buy LG's because over the years they prove to be the best for the price and they stand by their products . Several years ago my wife and I were looking for a 26" TV for our patio bar . We went to HH greg when they first opened in my area . The TV that we bought ( not an LG ) had such poor sound that we could not tell if it was a man or woman narrating a Tennis match . We took it back and got our money back . HH Gregs employee said all small TVs had poor sound and we would need to buy a sound bar if we wanted good sound . So you spend about $250 on a TV then they want you to spend another $100 to hear it . We have never been back . From then on it has been LG with good sound from our 42" to our 22" .

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: DGFIMP
Reviews.Content: Really great TV for the price, my first flat-screen ever and a good experience. Clear picture and good sound(although it seems a bit quiet for my taste). Excellent product from a well known brand!

Reviews.Title: Definitely worth it
Reviews.Author: Antonio
Reviews.Content: Definitely worth the money and with Prime it has a discounted price of over $70. I've seen a lot of negative reviews but this isn't supposed to be a groundbreaking TV. It has a fair price and the picture quality is very well worth the price. I'm 100% satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Put it in my bathroom so wasn't after best picture.
Reviews.Author: Allen Hanson
Reviews.Content: The audio isn't the best, but again it's in the bathroom. For what I bought it for I am very happy with it, for what it cost, the size it is, and the picture it has, I am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size
Reviews.Author: Sylvia M. Howard
Reviews.Content: Clear picture, vivid colors although it takes some tweaking to get it right. It looks a little washed out when viewing from an angle.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I've ever owned!!  Great picture and sound!  5-star service from seller!
Reviews.Author: Vicki Wilson
Reviews.Content: I think I will spend the few extra dollars and purchase LG from now on.  I see why it is rated #1 in Consumer Reports.  It has a great picture and great sound and I love it!

Reviews.Title: It does the job..
Reviews.Author: Jonal T Coleman
Reviews.Content: Nothing really fancy about this TV, but it has a great picture and the audio is decent.. I use it mounted to a wall in my office...Great basic TV.

Reviews.Title: great inexpensive HDTV
Reviews.Author: Todd Bradley
Reviews.Content: This TV was easy to set up, looks good, and has worked fine so far. The only downside is that I wish it had a second HDMI input, but at the low price I paid for this, I can't complain.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Stitchy lady
Reviews.Content: I have been very happy with the quality of this tv. I had concerns about the audiobut it is fine for my needs. I would recommend this for anyone looking for an "extra" tv.

Reviews.Title: Good computer monitor
Reviews.Author: John Porter
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for use solely as a computer monitor.  It has not disappointed.  Hookup with HDMI cable was easy.  The picture is sharp and clear.  Perfect for Netflix or watching streaming video of the NCAA basketball tournament.  The only negative is the poor sound quality, which is a minor complaint because I already own high-definition speakers.  Definitely a good deal for the money!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: M.A.
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV about a month ago for a bedroom and very happy with it. Unlike many flat screens, the sound is quite good even without the optional "clear voice" setting. Perfect picture, easy setup, good price. Definitely recommended!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: David J. Hoek
Reviews.Content: Use it in the kitchen as a replacement for a 13-inch model.  Great picture.  Only issue is with the sound volume on C-Span but I think this is a C-Span issue since I have to increase the sound level on the living room TV as well.

Reviews.Title: LG28
Reviews.Author: Gary Lotmore
Reviews.Content: I wanted a television for a bedroom and this one seemed a good deal.It serves the purpose and I would recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: avidread.1
Reviews.Author: avidread.1
Reviews.Content: I bought the 24-inch Led-it TV.  My old time television was two-tone.  I bought the TV with my Kindle in bed.  The TV arrived on time. It was easy to hook up and program.  I love my new TV and as soon as I can talk my husband the other old ancient TV needs to go. I buying a huge one for the front room.  If you need a new one amazon is the way to good. Gets here on time, you don't have carry it out of a store and try it get in a car. This is the only way to buy a TV.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: The set arrived earlier than expected and was nicely shipped and in perfect shape . The clarity of the picture after the initial hook-up has outstanding even with just using and HD antenna . Would recommend this set for smaller spaces but not for media area.

Reviews.Title: bought for my father-in-law a gift
Reviews.Author: Dale S. Clark
Reviews.Content: Father-in-law was thrilled with the gift! I set it up for him and was thrilled with the purchase I had made

Reviews.Title: It's O.K.
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Holmes
Reviews.Content: Good picture, right out of the box.  Perfect size for out condo a the beach.  One BIG problem.  Was not aware that it didn't have a headphone plug.  I had to buy a tuner/amp. just to use my headphones.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, easy setup
Reviews.Author: Scott H.
Reviews.Content: I had an old 15-inch Polaroid monitor that finally gave out after about 7 years, and needed to get something new and a bit better. I'm not a huge TV watcher but I do watch a lot of movies, so I just needed something relatively small but large enough to comfortably watch films on, and I stumbled across one of these at the store that was being sold for $135, discounted because it was a store display. Took it home, hooked it up within five minutes, and put on a movie; the picture is beautiful and infinitely better than what I was used to with my super tiny Polaroid monitor. I can't say how great the sound is because I have my DVD player hooked up to a stereo sound system, but aesthetically speaking, this is a really pretty television with sharp and clear picture. I think they normally run around $170, but even then I'd still say it's worth that. I just got lucky on the store display.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size and color for thisTelevision.
Reviews.Author: Gertrude Spilker
Reviews.Content: I needed a television for a shut-in and this meets all the requirements..Great picture quality and sound.LG made a shut-in very happy.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Becky Coats
Reviews.Content: Very nice tv and sounds great when connected to stereo speakers.  Very clear picture and nice size for a small room !

Reviews.Title: missing external speaker (audio out) connection
Reviews.Author: Leo Guevara
Reviews.Content: The TV is missing an audio out connection for external speaker or headphones, and the internal speakers doesn't look very powerful

Reviews.Title: Love this tv!
Reviews.Author: Tlmsrr
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great!!!!!!! I'd say just as good as the other/higher pixels (since the tv is smaller in size). The sound is great. Also, I was so pleased with the brightness options, let me explain. Besides the option to lower the: brightness, contrast and also backlight there is also another setting. It's on the remote and says: Picture. You can press it simply and it changes to different brightnesses. It's really great because I need a darker tv screen, and this being LED I was afraid that wasn't possible. But I changed it and it's the perfect brightness now. Just love this tv.

Reviews.Title: So clear and great!
Reviews.Author: naschick "guess_who666"
Reviews.Content: I have no problems with this TV. It is crystal clear, makes plugging in my laptop a BREAZE, and is big enough to see without my glasses on! Well, ish. My eyes are pretty bad haha. Anyway, it is still small enough to fit on my dresser, so I just love it!

Reviews.Title: Color Perfection with LG 29 inchLN4510 LED-lit TV
Reviews.Author: MBlake
Reviews.Content: The LG 29 inch 720p 60Hz TV has an excellent picture.  I have one in my bedroom and had to get one for downstairs in my den because the color is beautiful.  I couldn't fit the 32 inch in my media unit and am so glad I got the 29 inch because it appears larger than it is.  The colors are beautiful and you can see every little detail, e.g. food shows are fabulous, makes you want to get up and grab something from the fridge.  It's very easy to set up for even a novice like me.

Reviews.Title: LG 29 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: Bought it for son to play games on, it's thin and clarity is excellent.  Fit well into space that he was limited to with TV entertainment stand.  Very easy to set up, only had to attach HTMI cord and he was set to play.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, Great Picture
Reviews.Author: K. Studer "kstu"
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice inexpensive television.  In my opinion, LG is currently producing LED TVs with the highest picture of any manufacturer out there.  They are definitely up there with Samsung on overall quality.  No concerns so far.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Clear PictureGood VolumeWorks with both HDMI and Cable connectionGood PriceExactly what we needed for a bedroom

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: H. Chow
Reviews.Content: good tv, which the sound is loud enough for an apartment. since the speakers are behind the tv, the sound may not be as loud if mounted on the wall. the video is decent also, pick up all the channels using an over the air antenna, which i have mohu. since the buttons are in the front of the tv, it is easier to get to if the remote is misplaced.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a bedroom
Reviews.Author: peebee
Reviews.Content: It is a fine small TV, which fit the purpose perfectly for my bedroom location. I liked the picture quality and simplicity of the remote

Reviews.Title: Great Problem Solver
Reviews.Author: Dmitrifan
Reviews.Content: This is my second LG TV and we are very happy.  It fit the small bedroom perfectly and reception from rabbit ears is great.  We are able to watch over the air as well as streaming video with ease. Would recommend this set for anyone needing a smaller set.

Reviews.Title: Mom likes it
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom and she almost went crazy with happiness.  I think you'll have a better life if you buy this.  Love, Scott.

Reviews.Title: We love the TV
Reviews.Author: cabmab
Reviews.Content: We are having some issues getting the sound to regulate but we love the picture and the size, it fit perfect in our cabinet and was easy to install.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: kathleen
Reviews.Content: this TV has a great picture, works well and was just the right size for the area we have it in. We added a DVD player and works nicely.

Reviews.Title: Nice Product
Reviews.Author: Alejandro C. Carias R "Alejandro C."
Reviews.Content: Simple and Confortable..... didn't was easy to find a mounting wall base that fits good but ones i found it it was very simple to install

Reviews.Title: TV for bedroom
Reviews.Author: Jerry Jones
Reviews.Content: Picture quality was very good, comparable to the Panasonic Plasma we purchased.  Product was easy to set up and convient to use.

Reviews.Title: The perfect TV for a small space
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I am really happy with my purchase of the 26 inch LG TV. I bought it for a small apartment and it is perfect. The picture quality is great and the sound is excellent as well. I read in some other reviews that there were problems with the volume, or that it was too quiet, however I definitely have not had this problem, the sound quality is clear and loud. This is the perfect slim flat-screen for a small space.

Reviews.Title: LG 26 inch LED
Reviews.Author: Bill Lewis
Reviews.Content: Great tv-awesome picture and very easy setup...moved up from a 22 for a small space and LG has been great.

Reviews.Title: This tv performs much better than the Toshiba it replaced.
Reviews.Author: Lance B. "Sermon Watcher"
Reviews.Content: The LG has a much better picture and receives more channels from antenna than our previous tv. Very durable and attractive unit.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: J. Riggleman
Reviews.Content: Excellent tv, perfect size for a small space or vacation home.  Works great out of the box!  No problems with set up.

Reviews.Title: Nice television
Reviews.Author: K. Gustafson
Reviews.Content: This is a nice size television, pleasing picture, good controls. The remote control has a lot of buttons that take time to learn.  If you don't want to go for a large screen, or if your space is small, this is a nice set.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Lee Miley
Reviews.Content: Good

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: dk montgomery
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product based on the good reviews from other customers. The TV is perfect. It was given as a gift to my 82 year old mother for her bedroom. It was easy to set up and with her cable service all the channels and picture quality match her larger TV in the family room. Could not be happier. I originally ordered a smaller size and when it arrived I realized it was too small. Amazon made the return and exchange for the larger screen simple and easy. Thanks.Keith

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Brand
Reviews.Author: Sharon Finn
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift and they love it! I have an Lg myself as does my son since I bought him one as well. Extremely pleased with LG products

Reviews.Title: LG really is Life's Good
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Levin
Reviews.Content: My expectations for Led and LCD TV are always. A little beyond reality. That probably has more to do with the cable company than the TV. The set up of the LG TV is the easiest Of any TV I have set up particularly attaching the base. Also great support from LG in the form of emails tips, etc.

Reviews.Title: not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Gerald M.
Reviews.Content: I really didn't study the specs it is a nice replacement monitor but the resolution is only 1388 / 728It was too much different than the 1920 /1080 that I was used too.

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: cobman
Reviews.Content: i say this for two reasons.  first, i use this tv as a monitor for my pc.  The base is unstable and i had instances where the monitor fell onto my desk.  secondly, trying to turn the monitor on is a joke.i never know if the monitor will turn on or not.  either using the remote or turning it on from the back of the tv gives you a 50/50 chance of the monitor turning on.

Reviews.Title: SATISFIED CUSTOMER
Reviews.Author: Mr. Donatta
Reviews.Content: ITEM RECEIVED ON TIME WELL PACKAGED.  USED HDMI CABLE TO  CONNECT CABLE BOX TO TV.  PICTURE QUALITY IS EXCELLENT.  AS OTHER REVIEWERS HAS STATED  THE SOUND VOLUME AND QUALITY IS SUBPAR.  SOUND IS VERY  ''TINNY'' AND THE VOLUME IS  WEAK .  HENCE THE REMOVAL OF ONE STAR.  YES,  I WILL STILL  RECOMMEND THIS ITEM TO OTHERS.

Reviews.Title: A very good small digital tv
Reviews.Author: Robert C. Cover
Reviews.Content: This is a great small tv. 24 inch for a bedroom. We can also move it in or out of a trailer to go to Florida for 3 months this winter. The controls are easy to use and it has an excellent picture quality. The sound is a little 'small' so we might get larger speakers to plug into it in Florida but they are fine for a bedroom tv. So far very happy with this LG. We have another LG which we have also had good luck.

Reviews.Title: LG TV cant be beat.
Reviews.Author: J L. P.
Reviews.Content: No only is this my 4th LG tv, its my 3rd to buy from Amazon.  I will never buy a tv anywhere else but Amazon.  Best prices, free shipping, great warranty offered and the TV's can be beat for quality of performance.

Reviews.Title: It Fits!
Reviews.Author: William Lambert
Reviews.Content: Perfect for getting maxium screen into furniture designed for TVs over 20 years ago.It works in built-in spaces which can not be changed.

Reviews.Title: if you need something thin, that's about all it's worth
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: This was a gift, so I feel bad being so honest, but this TV is horrible.  To have a flat tv just for the sake of having a flat screen and feeling modern is a true waste of money ... unless you do not care about the picture quality and sound.The speakers are horrible, and the tinny noise is driving me nuts.  There are preset options built it to adjust bits of the sound, but adjusting those just gave the audio about a 1/2 second delay.If I had a downstairs, cellar basement, I'd be glad to have this there.  Alas, I do not, and have to decide if there's a way to politely get this junk returned without hurting feelings.If you're reading this, then you're trying to research the best and most economical tv for you.  Trust me, this is not it.  Good luck!

Reviews.Title: Fine for the bedroom except no sleep timer!!!! Duh!
Reviews.Author: RedSoxFan
Reviews.Content: Actually, there is a sleep timer, but it is buried in the menus.  There needs to be a shortcut button on the remote that you can toggle in the dark while half asleep.I think this is so absurd and I can only fall asleep with the TV on, I may return this unit.  The only problem is that the 29" size is just perfect and not too common.The 720p is fine for me and the speakers are ok. I appreciate a good picture, but am not a videophile.  I liked the price point.  My other TV candidate was going to be a 1080p Samsung 32".  More TV, but more money for something I didn't really need.

ProductInfo.Features:
You won't believe your eyes. LG?s LED technology delivers amazing brightness, clarity and color detail.
Pictures are sharper. Colors are more vibrant. Entertainment is more real. Everything looks better on an HDTV.
Energy Star qualified to ensure you save money when the TV is on and in standby mode.
ProductInfo.Name: LG Electronics 28LN4500 28-Inch 720p 60Hz LED TV (2013 Model)
